allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: add project configuration files

- Add .gitignore, .gitattributes, .editorconfig
- Add ESLint and Prettier configuration
- Add TypeScript configuration
- Add Yarn Berry setup with PnP
- Add VSCode workspace settings
- Add package.json with dependencies

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement mock-fried core module

OpenAPI Mock Server:
- Parse OpenAPI spec files \(YAML/JSON\)
- Parse generated TypeScript client packages
- Generate deterministic mock data from schemas
- Support nested generic types \(Array<Type>\)
- Handle snake_case/camelCase JSON key mapping
- Endpoint path matching with specificity priority

Protobuf RPC Mock:
- Parse .proto files using protobufjs
- Generate mock data for protobuf messages
- Support nested messages and enums

Features:
- $api client plugin for type-safe API calls
- API schema endpoint \(/mock/__schema\)
- Primitive type response handling \(object, string, etc.\)
- Pagination support \(page-based and cursor-based\)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

playground-proto:
